english: Please get us a meeting room for the next hour.
chinese: 请为我们安排下一小时的会议室。

english: Communication skills have become more important in recent years.
chinese: 近年来，沟通技巧变得更加重要。

english: Before preparing any food, be sure to wash your hands well.
chinese: 在准备任何食物之前，请务必彻底洗手。

english: I want to make an appointment with the manager.
chinese: 我想和经理预约。

english: The weather has been lovely from this time of the year.
chinese: 从每年的这个时候开始，天气就一直很好。

english: Please close the door behind you when you leave the room.
chinese: 当您离开房间时，请关上身后的门。

english: There was a lot of traffic this morning.
chinese: 今天早上交通很拥挤。

english: The restroom is down the hall and on the right.
chinese: 洗手间位于走廊下方的右侧。

english: The teacher explains the homework to the students.
chinese: 老师向学生解释作业。

english: At that time, few people moved through the town to the village.
chinese: 那时，很少有人从镇上搬到村里。

english: The fiction books have just passed to the counter.
chinese: 小说书刚刚送到柜台。

english: You have to make an appointment with your doctor.
chinese: 您必须与您的医生预约。

english: The students will meet their new teacher after summer vacation.
chinese: 暑假结束后，学生们将见到他们的新老师。

english: Please move us to the meeting room for the next hour.
chinese: 请让我们在接下来的一个小时内前往会议室。

english: You must call your doctor to make an appointment.
chinese: 您必须致电您的医生进行预约。

english: Please make an appointment with your tutor about work.
chinese: 请与您的导师预约工作事宜。

english: Rail transport is becoming more and more popular.
chinese: 轨道交通正变得越来越受欢迎。

english: You can keep your bags in the back room.
chinese: 您可以将行李存放在后面的房间。

english: The weather used to be lovely at this time of the year.
chinese: 每年的这个时候天气都很好。

english: Everyone in this room needs to follow the rules.
chinese: 这个房间里的每个人都需要遵守规则

english: Before preparing food, please make sure to wash your hands.
chinese: 准备食物之前，请务必洗手

english: The teacher explained the homework to the class.
chinese: 老师向全班解释作业。

english: You should meet me in the lecture theater room.
chinese: 你应该在演讲厅见我。

english: At that time, few people moved from towns to villages.
chinese: 那时，很少有人从城镇搬到村庄。

english: Students of the first year / first-year usually live on campus.
chinese: 第一年的学生通常住在校园里。

english: The fiction books are just past the counter.
chinese: 小说书就在柜台对面。

english: The teacher asked the group to complete the task.
chinese: 老师要求小组完成任务。

english: There was/were a lot of traffic jams on the road this morning.
chinese: 今天早上路上很堵车。

english: The school canteen sells a large variety of water and food.
chinese: 学校食堂出售各种水和食物。

english: Please turn off the lights to save the energy.
chinese: 请关闭灯以节省能源。

english: Traffic is the main cause of air pollution in many cities.
chinese: 交通是许多城市空气污染的主要原因。

english: You will get your uniform on the first day.
chinese: 您将在第一天获得制服。

english: In my opinion, this car should be repaired soon.
chinese: 我认为这辆车应该很快修好

english: We should have a meeting to discuss and report.
chinese: 我们应该开个会来讨论和报告

english: Sales figures for last year were better than expected.
chinese: 去年的销售数据好于预期。

english: The university canteen offers different healthy meal options.
chinese: 大学食堂提供不同的健康膳食选择。

english: Employment opportunities available in engineering are increasing rapidly.
chinese: 工程领域的就业机会正在迅速增加。

english: We cannot consider an increase in price at this stage.
chinese: 现阶段我们不能考虑提高价格。

english: We should have a meeting to discuss the report.
chinese: 我们应该开会讨论这份报告。

english: Our culture influences the choices we make.
chinese: 我们的文化影响我们做出的选择。

english: There will be a guest lecturer in the next class.
chinese: 下一堂课将有一位客座讲师。

english: Exam results will be published on the noticeboard/ notice board.
chinese: 考试成绩将在布告栏上公布

english: Atoms are the central building blocks of matter.
chinese: 原子是物质的核心组成部分。

english: There will be a meeting for the first-year/first year students on Friday.
chinese: 周五将为一年级学生举行一次会议。

english: The stairs are to the left of the elevator.
chinese: 楼梯在电梯的左边

english: Restrooms are down the entrance and to the right.
chinese: 卫生间位于入口下方右侧。

english: Time is needed to complete the lecture.
chinese: 需要时间来完成讲座。

english: Restaurants are down to the hall and next to the right.
chinese: 餐厅位于大厅下方右侧旁边

english: Make sure you wash your hands before preparing the food.
chinese: 准备食物前一定要洗手。

english: You should draw your graph on a separate page.
chinese: 你应该在单独的页面上绘制你的图表。

english: You can ask your tutor for further assistance.
chinese: 您可以向您的导师寻求进一步的帮助。

english: You are trained to be a special journalist.
chinese: 你被训练成一名特殊的记者。

english: We can have a lecture on the morning of Thursday.
chinese: 我们可以在星期四早上进行讲座。

english: We can all meet in the office after the lecture.
chinese: 讲座结束后我们可以在办公室见面。

english: The digital revolution has changed the way we read.
chinese: 数字革命改变了我们的阅读方式。

english: Before the refrigerator was invented, people used underground ice houses.
chinese: 在发明冰箱之前，人们使用地下冰室。

english: The nation achieved prosperity by opening its ports for trade.
chinese: 国家因开埠通商而富强。

english: Understanding visual media has never been more challenging.
chinese: 理解视觉媒体从未如此具有挑战性。

english: Online courses allow students to work on/at  their own paces/pace.
chinese: 在线课程允许学生按照自己的进度进行学习。

english: In my opinion, this car should be repaired soon.
chinese: 在我看来，这辆车应该尽快修好。

english: You can get your coffee and tea in the lounge room.
chinese: 您可以在休息室享用咖啡和茶。

english: The teacher asked the group to commence the task.
chinese: 老师要求小组开始任务

english: The island is located at the south end of the bay.
chinese: 该岛位于海湾南端

english: The falling birth rate means the number of students drops.
chinese: 出生率下降意味着学生人数下降。

english: Please click the logo above to enter the site.
chinese: 请点击上面的标志进入网站。

english: The camera can identify eyes and focus on them.
chinese: 相机可以识别眼睛并对其进行对焦。

english: This article refers to a number of interesting experiments.
chinese: 这篇文章提到了一些有趣的实验。

english: You should submit your team papers to the general office.
chinese: 您应该将团队文件提交给总办公室。

english: All students have their own styles of learning.
chinese: 所有学生都有自己的学习风格。

english: Stock prediction can be very capricious even for professionals.
chinese: 即使对于专业人士来说，股票预测也可能非常反复无常。

english: New classrooms will be put into use next month.
chinese: 新教室将于下个月投入使用。

english: You need to pass the written exam for the driver's license.
chinese: 您需要通过驾驶执照的笔试。
